mapper.select: select NVL(count(u_idx),0) from chat_user_${url} where u_idx = #{u_idx} and r_idx = #{r_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into chat_user_${url} (u_idx, r_idx, nickname) values (#{u_idx}, #{r_idx}, #{nickname})
mapper.delete: delete from chat_user_${url} where u_idx = #{u_idx} and r_idx = #{r_idx}
